references.paper_title: Tallrec: An effective and efficient tuning framework to align large language model with recommendation
references.reason: This paper proposes a novel tuning framework that aligns large language models with recommendation systems, which is directly relevant to the core methodology of the current paper.

references.paper_title: HLLM: Enhancing sequential recommendations via hierarchical large language models for item and user modeling
references.reason: This paper explores the use of hierarchical large language models for sequential recommendation, providing a related approach that the current work builds upon.

references.paper_title: Leveraging large language models in conversational recommender systems
references.reason: This paper investigates the application of LLMs in conversational recommender systems, offering insights into the integration of LLMs into the recommendation pipeline.

references.paper_title: Using collaborative filtering to weave an information tapestry
references.reason: This seminal paper introduced collaborative filtering, a foundational technique in recommendation systems that the current paper extends to multimodal LLMs.
This paper introduced the self-attentive sequential recommendation model, a key technique in sequential recommendation that serves as a baseline for the current work.
